item.title: New Features for the Misys Portal
item.description: To keep its leadership role in providing the International customers with powerful tools to manage their transactions online in a one stop portal, Misys' development team is preparing new features for the Misys Portal (including powerfull graphs, new modules).

item.title: Release of the Misys Portal v4
item.description: In March 2010, Misys is officially delivering version 4.0 of the Misys Portal.

item.title: Misys Portal for Opics Plus available now!!
item.description: Misys Portal for Opics Plus is a web-based customer facing solution which is designed to address the e-banking needs of a bank's corporate customers. The solution combines the extensive experience of the Misys Portal team in deploying market-leading internet based solutions and the Opics Plus team in providing robust treasury and capital markets functionality.

channel.title: News from Misys
channel.description: Newsfeed from Misys "E-nabling Your International Transactions"
